description: This file defines API utility functions for fetching product data from a backend API in a frontend application, including functions for retrieving a list of products and detailed information for a specific product, with support for query parameters.

methods.name: withQuery(base, params = {})
methods.description: Constructs a URL with query parameters from an object, defaulting to the API base URL or current window location.

methods.name: fetchProducts({ search, category, page, page_size } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of products from the API with optional search, category, page, and page size filters.

methods.name: fetchProductDetail(id)
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific product by ID.

ctags.name: fetchProducts
ctags.pattern: /^export async function fetchProducts({ search, category, page, page_size } = {}) {$/
